thread.title: Three charged for planning 'imminent' France terror attack
thread.title_full: Three charged for planning 'imminent' France terror attack

title: Three charged for planning 'imminent' France terror attack
text: show ad BREAKING NEWS: Three people including a 16-year-old girl are charged over plans to carry out 'imminent terror attack' in France 'after police found explosives in a flat' The three arrested near Montpellier - were identified as Thomas Sauret, 20; his partner, a 16-year-old minor named only as Sarah; and Malik Hammami, 33 They were charged on suspicion of planning an 'imminent' terror attack Sauret and his partner also charged with making and possessing explosives
